Title: Establishing Trade Routes
Description:
Help secure a trade route between Midgard outposts. Clear any hostile threats and mark safe passage points. Practical work that keeps commerce flowing.

=== TRADE ROUTE ESTABLISHMENT ===
ID: TRADE_ROUTE_ALPHA
